divs: Sighting DetailsFor over a month on a near nightly basis, I , myself and friends have witnessed a strange, large object in the western sky Sometimes it is accompanied by other lights. On this particular night.The large object ( much bigger than a star ), appeared . This object was bright yellow, white, green . It pulsated. I looked through my binoculars the object seemed to change shape from a sphere to an ellipse . It emitted energy appendages . The object hovered for 10 minutes and then slowly moved. It then moved to one spot and stayed for about 5 minutes. It grew brighter and dimmed. This object is in the flight path of the airport. Two planes approached from different directions and when the planes got close it immediately disappeared . I have 100 photos .I have 3 nights of video on my sony night-vision camera . I felt a direct connection to this object. I did not feel fear but I really believe it knew I was watching . I would love to find people with similar sightings in this area to compare notes I have tried to talk to the media, the FAA, Kennecott Copper, the Salt Lake INternational Airport anybody I can think of. The most helpful people have been astronomers in our area and they said this is not conventional .
trends: There have been 73 other sightings in Salt Lake City
There was one other sighting in Salt Lake City on or around September 3rd 2013
